mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.USER_ID, Q.QNA_DATE, A.ANSWER_STATUS FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC;

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.PHONE_NO, Q.QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q_QNA_NO, F.ORIGIN_NAME, F.CHANGE_NAME, F.PATH FROM MEMBER U INNER JOIN QNA Q ON U.USER_ID = Q.USER_ID INNER JOIN FILE_ADD F ON Q.QNA_NO = F.QNA_NO WHERE Q.QNA_NO = #{QNA_NO};

SELECT A.ANSWER_NO, A.ANSWER_TITLE, A.ANSWER_CONTENT, A.ANSWER_DATE, A.QNA_NO, F.ORIGIN_NAME, F.CHANGE_NAME, F.PATH FROM ANSWER A INNER JOIN FILE_ADD F ON A.ANSWER_NO = F.ANSWER_NO; WHERE A.QNA_NO = #{QNA_NO};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, USER_ID, PHONE_NO ) VALUES ( QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{QNA_TITLE}, #{QNA_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{USER_ID}, #{PHONE_NO} )
INSERT INTO FILE_ADD ( FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, QNA_NO, ANSWER_NO PATH ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ORIGIN_NAME}, #{CHANGE_NAME}, #{QNA_NO} #{ANSWER_NO} #{PATH} )
